title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 370.7 - Transfers of economic development power
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 370.7 - Transfers of economic development power

State Regulations

Any transfer of an economic development power allocation
between facilities of a recipient shall be subject to written approval of the
board. Such board approval shall not be given unless such approval is
consistent with the applicable criteria and requirements of this Part. Any
transfer which is accomplished without board approval shall be invalid and such
transfer shall subject the recipient to revocation of its allocation and
modification or revocation of the contract under which the recipient receives
such power. Notes

370.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
